keyMoments.title: Crew Coordinates Attack on Laboratory
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates work together with Law to infiltrate Caesar's laboratory, with Luffy declaring his intention to capture Caesar directly.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's strategic coordination in the Punk Hazard operation.

keyMoments.title: Franky Breaches Laboratory
keyMoments.description: Franky uses his Radical Beam to create an entrance into the heavily fortified laboratory.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's ability to overcome obstacles through their diverse skill sets.

keyMoments.title: Marines Killed by Smiley
keyMoments.description: Several G-5 Marines are killed when their stolen warship is destroyed by an exploding Smiley fragment.
keyMoments.significance: First major casualties from Caesar's weapon, demonstrating the lethal threat posed to everyone on the island.

memberChanges.description: Multiple G-5 Marines killed in ship explosion

activitiesThisEpisode: Attempting to escape Punk Hazard on stolen warship
Suffering casualties from poison gas explosion
